envPred 1.0.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

colwell74()

Calculates Constancy (C), Contingency (M), and Predictability (P) metrics from Colwell (1974) for seasonally varying environmental data. Can be applied to any phenomenon known or suspected to be periodic or cyclic in time which can be scored for at least two states. Scores from each month in the cycle are then collected for as many complete cycles as possible, and the data cast as a frequency matrix with months as columns, and states as rows. See Colwell (1974) for more information.

detrend_and_bin()

Binds output from linear_detrend and monthly_bins

envPredictability()

Calculates environmental predictability components Environmental predictability components (deprecated). Use predictability instead.

envPredictabilityAndColwell()

Calculates environmental predictability components and Colwell (1974) metric Environmental predictability components (deprecated). Use predictability_and_colwell instead.

gg_pred()

Plot predictability object

is_predictability()

Checks if argument is a predictability object

linear_detrend()

Linear detrending of time series

lmb_output_prep()

Calculates and renames output of Lomb-Scargle Periodogram

monthly_bins()

Compute the seasonal (monthly) components of time series

noise_calc()

Calculate the 'colour' of the noise of unpredicted de-trended residuals

npp

Net Primary Productivity (NPP) Time Series (1997-09-10 - 2008-01-05)

predictability()

Calculates environmental predictability components

predictability_and_colwell()

Calculates environmental predictability components and Colwell (1974) metric

seasonality_calc()

Calculate the 'colour' of unpredicted de-trended residuals

spec_output_prep()

Calculates and renames output of Spectrum Periodogram

spec_slope_get()

Calculate the 'colour' of environmental noise assuming 1/f noise family

sst

Sea Surface Temperature (SST) Time Series (1997-01-01 - 2007-12-31)
